metadata.name: Vavi The Happy Flamingo #1/2
metadata.description:
This is a gift to my first friend in WMG, who is leaving the company for a new adventure. I use A.I. to make an image and a song that represents her.  

The Happy Flamingo 
 
Verse 1:  
Flamingo, flamingo flying so high  
Leaving behind the life he used to lead  
On a journey to find his true self  
A new opportunity, a life of wealth

Chorus:  
Oh flamingo, flamingo flying free  
Spread your wings and soar across the sea  
A new chapter, a new beginning  
Flamingo, flamingo, let your spirit sing

Verse 2:  
The world is yours, the sky is the limit  
You can go anywhere, you can do anything  
Don't let anyone hold you back  
Just follow your heart, that's all you need to pack

Chorus:  
Oh flamingo, flamingo flying free  
Spread your wings and soar across the sea  
A new chapter, a new beginning  
Flamingo, flamingo, let your spirit sing

Bridge:  
The road may be long and the journey may be tough  
But you've got the strength, you've got the stuff  
Just keep on flying, keep reaching for the stars  
You'll find your way, no matter where you are

Chorus:  
Oh flamingo, flamingo flying free  
Spread your wings and soar across the sea  
A new chapter, a new beginning  
Flamingo, flamingo, let your spirit sing
